extendedInfo.description: Brand new football predictor app now in your mobile for free! The way To Earn Money on betting = value betting, betting system that works. Get daily football bets predictions right upon launch of the application. Getting statistical-driven football [soccer] daily betting picks has never been easier!Features:- Betting tips for FREE!- Daily value betting analysis- Covers most soccer leagues worldwide- Only value bets are picked, no need to browse through non-value opportunities, all the value is directly in your phoneDescription:Application bringing free daily picks for soccer betting [football betting]. Value betting is different approach to sports betting where bets are placed uncombined and mostly against the favorite of the game. Based on statistical results analysis each betting opportunity receives it's certitude percentage [percentual possibility of result taking place], multiplied with odds resulting variable called "value" is obtained. Any value above 1.00 is considered to be a value bet and combined with healthy money management should bring profit in long term.

reviews.title: Nice
reviews.comment: Pls provide a paid version to remove ads.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: burt
reviews.comment: i like this a lot . takes the hard work out of trying to find a value bet and tells you how much to stake  .a payed for version would be better without the adds , they are a pain .
reviews.author: Martin Payne

reviews.title: AVG Adware
reviews.comment: AVG doesn\'t like this on install.

reviews.title: VERY NICE
reviews.comment: so nice app please carry on.
reviews.author: U KYAW THUYA

reviews.title: Rubbish
reviews.comment: What a waste of time, checked the tips and I would have been well down if I had followed them. Almost every game tipped as a draw! Get real! Shockingly bad, stick to what you fancy, not the \'tips\' on this app!
reviews.author: Ed Hog

reviews.title: Stupid
reviews.comment: Everything i clicked is predicted as a draw. Surely not?
reviews.author: Todd Wison

reviews.title: Avoid
reviews.comment: This app reckons EVERY match will be drawn! If only!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Wtf?
reviews.comment: All it does is loading and displaying ads. Worthless. Don\'t download.
